attributes.action: Support & protect the hospitality industry through Covid-19 pandemic and beyond
attributes.additional_details:
Support in the form of:

Business rates relief for 6 months from 01/04/20 for all A1/A3 Cafe, restaurants and pub businesses, independent or of organisations of 10 sites or less.

Rent relief for 3 months for all A1/A3 Cafe, restaurants and pub businesses, independent or of organisations of 10 sites or less if forced to close by government.

Government backed income support for duration (in event) of industry wide forced closure for all employees of businesses as above for all contract types
attributes.background:
Provide stability, financial and legislative support for hospitality businesses and the SKILLED professionals who make up the 3rd largest employing industry in the UK. Contributing (both directly and indirectly) £158 billion to the UK economy.

Support small independents & hard working people
